snippet: President Raul Castro demanded on Saturday that the United States respect Cuba's communist rule as the two countries work to restore diplomatic ties, and warned that Cuban-American exiles might try to sabotage the rapprochement....

headline.print_headline: Cuba Says U.S. Must Respect Its Communist System
headline.main: Cuba Says U.S. Must Respect Its Communist System

lead_paragraph: President Raul Castro demanded on Saturday that the United States respect Cuba's communist rule as the two countries work to restore diplomatic ties, and warned that Cuban-American exiles might try to sabotage the rapprochement.
